Class PhotoController

java.lang.Object
com.epitech.pictsmanager.controllers.PhotoController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api/photo") public class PhotoController extends Object
Controller class for handling photo-related operations

    • getPhotosByAlbumId

      @Cacheable(cacheNames="photos") @GetMapping("/user/{ownerId}/album/{albumId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<Photo>> getPhotosByAlbumId(@PathVariable Long ownerId, @PathVariable Album albumId)
      Retrieves photos by album ID
      Parameters:
      ownerId - The ID of the owner of the photos
      albumId - The ID of the album containing the photos
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the list of photos and HTTP status 200 (OK)

    • getPhotosByUserIdAndVisibility

      Retrieves photos by user ID and visibility
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user
      visibility - The visibility status of the photos

      ResponseEntity containing the list of photos and HTTP status 200 (OK)

    • delete

      @DeleteMapping("delete/{photoId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> delete(@PathVariable Long photoId, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      Deletes a photo by its ID
      Parameters:
      photoId - The ID of the photo to delete
      request - The HTTP servlet request
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing a success message or an error message and HTTP status

    • uploadPhoto

      @PostMapping("/upload") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> uploadPhoto(@RequestParam("file") org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile file, @RequestParam("name") String name, @RequestParam("description") String description, @RequestParam("albumId") Album albumId, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      Uploads a photo to the server
      Parameters:
      file - The MultipartFile containing the photo data
      name - The name of the photo
      description - The description of the photo
      albumId - The ID of the album to which the photo belongs
      request - The HTTP servlet request
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing a success message or an error message and HTTP status
